SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Server.Connections

Class ServerConnectionHandlerRMI

java.lang.Object
Server.Connections.ServerConnectionHandlerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, ServerConnectionHandler
public class ServerConnectionHandlerRMI extends Object implements ServerConnectionHandler, Remote
This class handles the connection between the server and the clients using RMI

    ServerConnectionHandlerRMI()
    Standard constructor Asks for the port to start the rmi server on and starts it on that port, or the next available one

      public LobbyPlayersMessage join(int rmi_port) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Description copied from interface: ServerConnectionHandler
      This is used by RMI clients to connect to the server
      Specified by:
      join in interface ServerConnectionHandler
      Parameters:
      rmi_port - the port of the RMI server
      Returns:
      the message with the required client data
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when failing to connect
      NotBoundException - when the server is not bound

      Description copied from interface: ServerConnectionHandler

      Returns:

    • ping

      public void ping(String id)
      Pings a client. If it fails, sets the client as offline
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the client to check

    • pingAll

      public void pingAll()
      Pings all clients and sets the disconnected ones as offline
